title: Don't forget to order your #Thanksgiving #Pies! Choices include Pumpkin, Apple, Pecan and Sweet Potato...

attachments.displayName:
Don't forget to order your #Thanksgiving #Pies! Choices include Pumpkin, Apple, Pecan and Sweet Potato. If you're a past or current client, your pie is on us as a THANK YOU for trusting Team Lynch with all your Real Estate needs, if you'd like to order a pie for family or friends- you can do that as well. Just include $25 per pie with your order!
Let's make this "Pie in the Sky" fundraiser the best year yet!

object.content:
Don't forget to order your #Thanksgiving #Pies! Choices include Pumpkin, Apple, Pecan and Sweet Potato. If you're a past or current client, your pie is on us as a THANK YOU for trusting Team Lynch with all your Real Estate needs, if you'd like to order a pie for family or friends- you can do that as well. Just include $25 per pie with your order!
Let's make this "Pie in the Sky" fundraiser the best year yet!
